title: U.F.C. 281 Live: Zhang Wins, Poirier Beats Chandler, Adesanya Fights Pereira
description: Israel Adesanya defends his 185-pound crown against Alex Pereira. Before that, Dustin Poirier beat Michael Chandler with a choke, and Zhang Weili won a 115-pound title over Carla Esparza the same way.
dc:creator: The New York Times
media:description: Dustin Poirier, said after the fight that he was in trouble in the first round before turning things around to beat Michael Chandler.
